item.description:
Let's try the Wine Room at Sonsie, located on Newbury Street. Here's their description and the food is quite wonderful... my thought is that we could try some reds and pair with some autumn light fare...

From their website:

New at Sonsie located on the lower level the Wine Room is the perfect location to enjoy your favorite bottle of wine cocktail and sample the menu from Chef Bill Poirier Open Monday thru Saturday from 6pm to 1 am 2006 Best of Boston Award Winner

See you there.... yes or no rsvp's only.... remember, please keep me posted on a change of plans so I can let the venue know in advance if the numbers change....

Members who haven't joined us yet are highly encouraged to join this group of fun and interesting people!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be in the entrance of the restaurant
item.name: Delectable Wine tasting at Sonsie
